Title: Bend It Like Beckham
Writer: Gurinder Chadha, Guljit Bindra, Paul Mayeda Berges
Actors: Parminder Nagra, Keira Knightley, Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Anupam Kher
Plot: Two ambitious girls, despite their parents' wishes, have their hearts set on careers in professional soccer.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 17 wins & 19 nominations.
Production: Helkon Media AG, Kintop Pictures, British Screen Productions, Film Council, Scion Films
